abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column on Nobel prize-winning economists Thomas J Sargent and Christopher A Sims, who are uncomfortable with limelight and pidgeonholing they have been subject to since winning the award.
snippet: Nobel prizes may be the ultimate attention-grabbers, but the new Nobel laureates in economics weren’t entirely relishing the spotlight last week.
lead_paragraph: Nobel prizes may be the ultimate attention-grabbers, but the new Nobel laureates in economics weren’t entirely relishing the spotlight last week.

headline.seo: Nobel Laureates in Economics, Uneasy With Labels
